articles.author: Chris Isidore, Vanessa Yurkevich
articles.title: UAW workers launch unprecedented strike against all Big Three automakers - CNN
articles.description: The United Auto Workers union is on strike against General Motors, Ford and Stellantis, the first time in its history that it has struck all three of America’s unionized automakers at the same time.
articles.content:
The United Auto Workers union is on strike against General Motors, Ford and Stellantis, the first time in its history that it has struck all three of Americas unionized automakers at the same time.
